name: Rogue Planet: Golden Hour
description:
Golden Hour is the  first, and    final update to my re-released passion project:

Rogue Planet: Reimagined

Golden Hour is a linear, dream-like FPS game inspired by   the LucasArts Adventure games and Indiana Jones, made with the blood, sweat, and tears from three years of hard work. 

I've put everything I love in my games into this one, and hope you will love it too.

The game will stay as-is until further notice. Expect no more updates.

Our golden hour is at hand... Will you join us?
